page.title: 19STEVENAGE- LOCAL POLICEMAN
page.content: Our Neighbourhood policeman is P.C Locke. He lives in a house near to Woolenwick Schools where his children went until they were 11 years old. He visits our school every term to talk to the fourth year classes. He tells them all about his job in the area. He usually goes everywhere on his bike and he has a personal radio so that he can contact his control and they can keep in touch with him. He has to use a code of special numbers to let the station know where he is and what he is doing and to get help if he needs it. Sometimes he talks about crime or shows films. He usually helps the children to do a play about the police at work and he takes the class around the local police station and shows them the cells and all the offices and other rooms and how to use the Telex.
